pageContext.claim: “At 10:00 P.M. on Election Evening, we were at 97% win with the so-called 'bookies'.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's probability of winning never reached 97% in the betting markets. "Action Network said Trump’s odds to defeat Biden, who has since won the election, were at 74.2% at 10 p.m. Nov. 3. Those were his best odds of the week. His probability through US-Bookies.com at 10 p.m. implied he had a 71% chance to win," reported McClatchy News.. "Odds shifted toward Trump following early vote projections from Florida and Pennsylvania, with the latter state eventually going to Biden in a race that Trump has contested for weeks, McClatchy News reported. The odds began to shift back toward Biden late on election night as Arizona’s results trickled in, coupled with Georgia’s votes looking closer than initially thought. Biden would go on to win both states."
